name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: [DANMUV] YOUTUBE DANMU 弹幕 彈幕 弾幕

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever heard about Niconico or Bilibili? What about Danmu(弹幕,彈幕,弾幕,だんまく)? This has been a viral thing in East Asia Internet. Basically, you send flying comments over the video to comment out any character at any second of any scene and enjoy the fun comments from other commenters. Trust me, it has more fun than you think.
